archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Notify T&M Root Cause Customer Problem
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process notifies the Track & Manage Customer Problem processes when the analysis is complete. Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory Not used for this process element Mandatory Notifies the Track & Manage Customer Problem processes when the analysis is complete.
